      • findDestinationAtNetherPortal

        public static PortalDestination findDestinationAtNetherPortal(org.bukkit.block.Block portalBlock,
                                                              Direction direction)
        Looks for suitable rails nearby a nether portal, checking all portal blocks for closeby rails
        Parameters:
        portalBlock - to start looking from
        direction - to spawn into (preferred)
        Returns:
        rail destination (null if not found)

      • findDestination

        public static PortalDestination findDestination(org.bukkit.block.Block regionMin,
                                                org.bukkit.block.Block regionMax,
                                                Direction direction)
        Looks for suitable rails inside or against a block region, selecting the destination if found. The direction is used for the spawn direction and to filter the rails to spawn at.
        Parameters:
        regionMin - minimum coordinates of the region
        regionMax - maximum coordinates of the region
        direction - preferred
        Returns:
        destination, null if not found
